alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 10 at 3:38AM AKST until January 11 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds could blow around unsecured objects, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mountain wave may develop in Downtown Juneau and Douglas. The strongest winds would occur between Wednesday evening and Thursday morning.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure vessels and loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
